dokumentation.title: Test-data on interventions to reduce the development of intrusions using the traumafilm paradigm
dokumentation.researchQuestion: Can we identify certain groups of interventions (e.g. context-based vs. language-based) to reduce intrusive memories using an analoque trauma film paradigm?
dokumentation.literatureSelection: Inclusion: Quantitative studies on the trauma film paradigm from the first development of the paradigm in 1960 in which a trauma paradigm is used; intrusive memories are measured and a group comparison was made for intrusion reduction; At least two groups of adult and healthy participants; The comparator is a control condition relative to the intervention or manipulation; At least one between-group comparison; At least one measure for intrusion frequency
dokumentation.Exclusion: No TFP study; No group comparison
dokumentation.hierarchicalStructure: Some samples consisted of multiple interventions and control groups. An effect size was calculated for each active intervention vs. passive control group.
